Name: Mila the Baker - Quest 1
Quest Description: Gather 3 wheat and 1 honey.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Fresh wheat| sweet honey… maybe we can taste normal life again.”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “Still waiting on that wheat and honey| dear.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Perfect! This will keep the ovens warm for another day.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “Ah| no ingredients? The oven will have to stay cold.”

Name: Mila the Baker - Quest 2
Quest Description: Bake carrot cake and deliver.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Carrot cake… just like the old festivals. Can you make it?”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “The cake isn’t baking itself| you know.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “It smells divine! You’ve brought smiles back to the town.”

Name: Mila the Baker - Quest 3
Quest Description: Bring tomato soup ingredients or cook it yourself.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Soup or raw tomatoes? I trust your chef’s instinct.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Oh| that soup is comforting. You made the right choice.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “I guess raw will have to do.”

Name: Tomo the Scout - Quest 1
Quest Description: Find 2 berries and make jelly food| defend the pot.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Two berries. Jelly time! And watch for trouble.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Nice! Even the scouts are licking their spoons.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “Guess the jelly spoiled on the way.”

Name: Tomo the Scout - Quest 2
Quest Description: Bring raw veggies or cook a veggie meal.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Veggies—cook them or hand them over. Your call.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Hearty! I’ll be full on my next patrol.”

Name: Gregor the Miner - Quest 1
Quest Description: Feed the miner a cooked dish.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “A proper meal will keep my pick swinging. Cook it if you can.”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “I can’t mine on an empty stomach.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “That hit the spot. Back to the mines.”

Name: Gregor the Miner - Quest 2
Quest Description: Bring blue herb and spice leaf for pain relief.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Blue herb and spice leaf—pain’s a constant down there.”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “Still hurting… any sign of those herbs?”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “That eases the aches. Much appreciated.”

Name: Gregor the Miner - Quest 3
Quest Description: Cook mushroom stew for the miner.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Mushroom stew… hearty enough to fill even me.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Ohh~ that was good! Thanks| chef.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “Guess it wasn’t meant to simmer today.”

Name: Kira the Guard - Quest 1
Quest Description: Retrieve combat herb and cook it.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Combat herbs—cook them into something potent.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “This will keep me standing guard all night.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “No dish? I’ll stay sharp on willpower.”

Name: Kira the Guard - Quest 2
Quest Description: Bring fish fillet or cook a hearty fish meal.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Fish fillet—raw or cooked| just make it hearty.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Cooked perfectly! My sword arm feels lighter.”

Name: Nana the Elder - Quest 1
Quest Description: Recover lost ingredients in raider zone.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Lost ingredients… bring them home.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Our cupboards thank you| child.”

Name: Nana the Elder - Quest 2
Quest Description: Collect cactus gel and smoke pepper for potion.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Cactus gel and smoke pepper for my old remedies.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Perfect blend. The medicine will help many.”

Name: Nana the Elder - Quest 3
Quest Description: Bring dragonfruit raw or as cooked elixir.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Dragonfruit—bring it raw or surprise me.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Ah| a treat! Cooked or raw| it soothes the heart.”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “No fruit? The cure will have to wait.”

Name: Rico the Kid - Quest 1
Quest Description: Find special fruit and return to town.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Special fruit! Please bring one. I’ve never tasted it!”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “The fruit is still out there| right?”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Wow! It’s sweeter than I imagined!”

Name: Rico the Kid - Quest 2
Quest Description: Cook him a sweet fruit snack.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Sweet snack? Cook it for me| please!”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “That’s amazing! You’re the best chef ever!”
Quest Failure Dialogue: “No snack? Guess I’ll go hungry again.”

Name: Valko the Leader - Quest 1
Quest Description: Defend a full-course meal from elite raiders.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Full-course meal. Raiders will come. Be ready.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “The town eats well tonight| thanks to you.”

Name: Valko the Leader - Quest 2
Quest Description: Gather beast bone and molten herb or cook a spicy stew.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Beast bone and molten herb—cook or return| your choice.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Spicy stew! Perfect morale for the guards.”

Name: Valko the Leader - Quest 3
Quest Description: Cook high-energy meal using region 4 ingredients.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “High-energy meal. Only the best for our defense.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Exactly what we needed. Stronger already.”

Name: Lumi the Forager - Quest 1
Quest Description: Gather 3 random special ingredients from region 2 to 4.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Three special ingredients. Rare finds only!”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “These will fetch wonders in the kitchen.”

Name: Lumi the Forager - Quest 2
Quest Description: Bring a cooked dish using rare mushroom or shadow egg.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Rare mushroom or shadow egg—cook them well.”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Perfect dish! Flavor beyond compare.”

Name: Lumi the Forager - Quest 3
Quest Description: Pick 2 rare items and decide to return or cook.
Quest Prompt Dialogue: “Two rare items. Your call to cook or not.”
Quest Waiting Dialogue: “Still deciding what to do with those?”
Quest Succes Dialogue: “Great choice! Every bite worth it.”
